result.title: Hello my frnds
result.content: Sorry for not writing 4 ages!! :(( I miss u so much im sure that you miss me 2 so now im writing sth bout me so you can feel my presence!! Im in ur hearts remember that!! I love russian dumplings!! (thats sth bout me now write sth bout u!) XOXO see u, write me back XOXOXOXOOXOXOXOXOXOXO Kisses peace n love XOXO
